hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"
REM xcopy /S /I /E N:\shared\Jenkins_Harvester\Git_Latest %WORKSPACE% /Q /Y set VECTORCAST_DIR=N:\shared\.VCAST_REGRESSION\VC_latest\windows set PYTHONPATH=C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\junit_xml-1.0-py2.7.egg set VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=C:\flexlm\vector-INDIAWINDOWSBUI.lic
REM call buildWin.bat msvc9 --arch=all REM cd build REM call install.bat
cd %WORKSPACE% REM mkdir tbuild cd tbuild REM cmake ..\tests cd HelloTest %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython ..\VcRunTests.py
mkdir cbuild cd cbuild set PATH=C:\cygwin\bin;%PATH% bash -c "cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++" %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython ..\VcRunTests.py
